Audio.Locality: Hotel Donati, Itatiaia NP, Rio de Janeiro state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural daytime song from a a bird 2-8m up, actively foraging. Sitting on dead branches below canopy of broken woodland on hotel grounds.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Todirostrum poliocephalum,Cacicus haemorrhous,Megarynchus pitangua,Thraupis palmarum,Myiozetetes similis,Brotogeris tirica,Cyclarhis gujanensis,Cranioleuca pallida
